xmlText.p: First Period_1, Minnesota, Zucker 26 (Staal, Suter), 2:57 (pp). 2, Minnesota, Granlund 18 (Staal, Zucker), 7:13. 3, St. Louis, Tarasenko 25 (Steen, Schenn), 9:59. 4, Minnesota, Granlund 19 (Prosser, Seeler), 11:17. Penalties_Sobotka, STL, (holding), 2:51; Eriksson Ek, MIN, (hooking), 14:39; Jaskin, STL, major (high sticking), 17:25; Granlund, MIN, (tripping), 19:30.

Second Period_5, St. Louis, Pietrangelo 10 (Schwartz, Bouwmeester), 0:15. 6, Minnesota, Staal 31 (Suter, Zucker), 8:19 (pp). 7, Minnesota, Koivu 10 (Parise, Coyle), 17:07. 8, St. Louis, Tarasenko 26 (Schwartz, Steen), 18:32 (pp). 9, Minnesota, Spurgeon 9 (Granlund, Suter), 19:44. Penalties_Seeler, MIN, (interference), 3:19; Steen, STL, served by Jaskin, (boarding), 7:39; Bouwmeester, STL, (delay of game), 7:46; Niederreiter, MIN, (holding), 17:53.

Third Period_10, Minnesota, Staal 32 (Zucker, Koivu), 7:46. 11, Minnesota, Staal 33 (Granlund, Zucker), 10:54. Penalties_Koivu, MIN, (interference), 5:28; Pietrangelo, STL, (slashing), 11:10; Cullen, MIN, (tripping), 11:21.
Power-play opportunities_St. Louis 1 of 6; Minnesota 2 of 6.
Goalies_St. Louis, Allen 19-19-2 (8 shots-5 saves), Hutton 15-7-2 (25-20). Minnesota, Dubnyk 27-11-5 (25-22).
Referees_Eric Furlatt, Jon Mclsaac. Linesmen_Brad Kovachik, Derek Nansen.
